overview:
Cumberland Associates, LLC Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer Gary G. Tynes graduated from the Hofstra University in 1986. He began his career with Grant Thornton (formerly Spicer & Oppenheim) the same year, and joined Cumberland Associates in 1990.

Cumberland Associates, LLC holds a track record of successful investment partnership management endeavors in the United States. The company targets pooled investment vehicles and provides pension and profit sharing plans. Cumberland Associates is also a registered adviser with the U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission.

Corporate Address: 767 Third Avenue FL 39 New York, NY 10017 Website URL: http://www.cumberassoc.com Email: gtynes@cumberassoc.com
